headline.print_headline: Video Showing Student Arrest In South Carolina Puts Focus on Role of School Officers
headline.main: Video of Student Arrest in South Carolina Puts Focus on School Officers

snippet: School resource officers have become commonplace in schools around the country, with tens of thousands of them deployed in elementary to high schools.
lead_paragraph: School resource officers have become commonplace in schools around the country, with tens of thousands of them deployed in elementary to high schools.
